alert.note: Alert for Conway; Southeast Van Buren County; Southern Pope County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Van Buren, northeastern Conway and east central Pope Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Claude, or 12 miles southwest of Clinton, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bethlehem... Lanty... Whipple... Jerusalem... Solgohachia... Claude... Cleveland... St. Vincent... Catholic Point... Blick... Hattieville... Middleton... Birdtown... Appleton... Beverage Town... Austin in Conway County... Overcup... Scotland... Wonderview... Formosa... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Southeast Van Buren County; Southern Pope County
